ygData.subject: Re: Large banded molds
ygData.msgSnippet: The closest place I know of that you can get molds is in West Karana.  If you follow the river there is a Barbarian village and you can get all of the molds
ygData.messageBody:
The closest place I know of that you can get molds is in West Karana. If
you follow the river there is a Barbarian village and you can get all of the
molds there. But if you are a Barbarian you are better off wearing Medium
armor. Its lighter. If you are a Troll or Ogre then you will have to get
them in one of those cities. I don't know where they are there.

Mark

> For those of you kind enough to answer my questions quickly, thank you!
But
> what I'd like to know is, is there any place closer to Freeport, Neriak,
> Ogguk and Grobb than Everfrost Peaks/Halas to get large banded molds?
